display_name.description: A human-readable name or title to display

game.title: Inner Space Game
game.description: The Inner Space Game Name for launching. This is the name from the Inner Space menu, when launching a game instance direct through Inner Space.

gameProfile.title: Inner Space Game Profile
gameProfile.description: The Inner Space Game Profile Name for launching. This is the name from the Game's sub-menu, when launching a game instance direct through Inner Space.

parameters.title: Executable Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters to be passed to the Main executable.

parametersExclusive.title: Parameters Exclusive
parametersExclusive.description: If true, Parameters given are exclusive and replace any Parameters in the Game Profile. If false, Parameters given are added to any Parameters in the Game Profile.

innerSpaceWindow.title: Inner Space Window
innerSpaceWindow.description: Describes how to launch an Inner Space session window

characterSet.title: Character Set
characterSet.description: The name of a Character Set in ISBoxer 1

slotNumber.title: Slot Number
slotNumber.description: The Slot Number to launch, e.g. with 1 being the first Slot

isboxer1Window.title: ISBoxer 1 Window
isboxer1Window.description: Describes how to launch an ISBoxer 1 Character Set Slot

externalWindow.title: External Window
externalWindow.description: Describes how to launch a non-Inner Space window

minDelayBefore.title: Minimum Delay Before Launch
minDelayBefore.description: Minimum delay, in seconds, after launching one window but before launching this one

minDelayAfter.title: Minimum Delay After Launch
minDelayAfter.description: Minimum delay, in seconds, after launching this window and before launching the next one
